assignments.description: Assign type and sub-type of case from known status/sub-status values
assignments.name: Set_case_variables
assignments.label: Set case variables

decisions.description: If there is no sub-status and the household is in onboarding, we need to prevent the advice case being created.
decisions.name: Onboarding_sub_status
decisions.label: Onboarding sub-status

Flow.description: This flow walks the user through creating a case for a household. This allows us to customise the case creation process and get more out of it than we can with the standard create dialogue.

formulas.name: CaseSubCriteriaFormula
formulas.expression: CASE({!Get_household_details.FinServ__Status__c}, "Active","Active customer", "Onboarding", CASE({!Get_household_details.OW_sub_status__c}, "Data gathering","Customer pre-advice", "Risk call","Customer pre-advice", "Present advice","Customer pre-advice", "Suitability declined","Customer declined advice", ""), "")

formulas.name: caseTypeFormula
formulas.expression: CASE({!Get_household_details.FinServ__Status__c}, "Active","OFFBOARDING_ACTIVE_CUSTOMER", "Onboarding", CASE({!Get_household_details.OW_sub_status__c}, "Data gathering", "OFFBOARDING_DURING_ADVICE", "Risk call", "OFFBOARDING_DURING_ADVICE", "Prepare advice", "OFFBOARDING_DURING_ADVICE", "Present advice", "OFFBOARDING_DURING_ADVICE", "In fulfilment", "OFFBOARDING_DURING_FULFILMENT", "Suitability declined", "OFFBOARDING_ADVICE_DECLINED", "ERROR"), "ERROR")

formulas.description: Formula to check if the status of any advice found is declined, if so, set subtype of case to declined. If declined is not found in any related advice, leave sub type blank.
formulas.name: DeclinedStatusFormula
errorMessageDetail
formulas.expression: CASE({!caseCreateError}, "CANCEL_ONBOARDING_ALREADY_PRESENTED", "You cannot create a Cancel Onboarding case for this client because advice has already been presented to them.", "NO_RECORD_TYPES_AVAILABLE", "You are unable to create any cases for this household right now. This could be down to the status of the household and your permissions.", "TYPE_RECORD_TYPE_DO_NOT_MATCH", "Please do not change the case type from what you select initially. This field cannot be read only yet sorry.", "NO_SUB_STATUS","This household is in onboarding but missing its sub-status. Please ask the Salesforce team for support before requesting offboarding.", "")

formulas.name: subjectDefault
formulas.expression: CASE({!caseRecordTypeDeveloperName}, "GDPR", "GDPR request", "PersonalInformationChange", "Update details for " & {!PersonSelection.firstSelectedRow.Name}, "ProfitAndLoss", "Profit and loss for " & {!Get_household_details.Name}, {!caseRecordTypeDeveloperName} & " for " & {!Get_household_details.Name})

Flow.label: Account | Create Case

recordLookups.name: Get_any_advice_awaiting_a_decision
recordLookups.label: Get any advice awaiting a decision

fields.name: MustUpdateAdviceOutcome
fields.fieldText: We've found some advice that has been presented and is awaiting an outcome decision, or is currently in fulfilment. You must decline the advice before you can create an offboarding case.

fields.name: CasePersonPrompt
fields.fieldText: Who is this case being raised for?

fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
{!errorMessageDetail}


Please talk to the Salesforce team if you have any questions about this.

fields.name: CaseTypeRequired
fields.fieldText: Please choose a case type

fields.name: How_did_we_get_this_request
fields.fieldText: How did we get this request?

validationRule.errorMessage: Date of request cannot be in the future!

fields.name: Reason_for_leaving_notes
fields.helpText: Please provide additional detail on why this customer will no longer be onboarded

validationRule.errorMessage: Reason for leaving notes cannot be greater than 1000 characters.
Name must be changed and max of {!FirstAndMiddleNameCharacterLimit} characters
Name must be changed and max of {!FirstAndMiddleNameCharacterLimit} characters
Name must be changed and max of {!LastNameCharacterLimit} characters

fields.name: Platform
fields.helpText: Please select where the responsibility for calculating the P&L sits.

variables.description: Collection to store all related advice status's
variables.name: adviceStatusCollection

variables.description: If true, a person needs to be specified as part of this case, e.g. where it relates to name change.
variables.name: personRequired

variables.description: Stores the record types that can be chosen by the user. This list will be populated in the opening of the flow.
variables.name: recordTypes
